body_html:
I do not think this change will work. This is how os.path.join works:

>>> import os
>>> os.path.join('a', 'b')
'a/b'
>>> os.path.join('a', '/b')
'/b'

So the first part of the path, TEST_TMPDIR is ignored with your change. I am closing this PR.

body:
I do not think this change will work. This is how `os.path.join` works:
```
>>> import os
>>> os.path.join('a', 'b')
'a/b'
>>> os.path.join('a', '/b')
'/b'
```
So the first part of the path, `TEST_TMPDIR` is ignored with your change. I am closing this PR.
